summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for, the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of West Sixty-first Street, from West Sixty-first Street, as platted in Peter J. Hansen's First Addition to the City of Seattle, to Thirty-fourth Avenue Northwest, as provided in Ordinance No. 49340 of the City of Seattle, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
